a:s.a:s: /* * Library: IMMZD5DTBCGCILogic (IMMZ.D5.DT.BCG contraindications) * Rule: Check for contraindications before administering the vaccine(s) due * Decision Table: Potential contraindications * Trigger: IMMZ.D5 Determine vaccine(s) to be administered based on contraindications */ library IMMZD5DTBCGCILogic
